New Records: Anrich Nortje claimed a four-fer as the Proteas beat Sri Lanka by 6 wickets
Key Match Events: David Miller scored the winning runs for the Proteas as they clinched the win with 22 balls to spare
Wanindu Hasaranga removed Quinton de Kock for 20
Heinrich Klaasen smashes Wanindu Hasaranga for a maximum and a four
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka elect to bat first
Sri Lanka - A formidable bowling unit
Post-Match Reflections: Anrich Nortje said 'Definitely, this will get some momentum going. Tough few days, we've worked hard and it's nice to get some momentum. Very happy, I've been feeling good from the last few games, finally great to have a good game and get a few wickets'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa started their campaign on a positive note with a 6-wicket win
Sri Lanka bowlers tried to fight back but their batters didn't give them enough runs to fight for
